fields.text: Welcome to Stitch Fix, your inclusive personal styling service based in San Francisco.
For personalized outfit recommendations across all sizes and budgets, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you with a personal stylist.
For questions about your latest fix or delivery status, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our delivery support team.
For account and billing support, press '[INDEX]'.
For account management, such as updating your profile, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to account services.
For billing issues, refunds, and payment inquiries, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.
